infos.value: The day is dawning, Lady Miranda.
...Indeed.
Lady Miranda, your orders?
We are ready—you only need to give the word.
We will bring down Khury, even if we must lay down our lives!
That will not do.
Do not get any grand ideas of felling enemy soldiers or storming the castle.
B-but—!
...Do you understand me?
Your mission is to draw the enemy's attention.
If you are ever outnumbered, do not hesitate to retreat.
Apologies, but we cannot do that while Lady Glaciela is putting her life on the line.
I cannot justify us running away with our backs bent over!
Worry not.
Once Lady Glaciela's brigade has stormed the castle, that is when our true fight begins.
Then—!
We will make our way to the castle gates and take to the castle ourselves.
Then you can draw as much blood as you like.
...Yes, ma'am!
...Dawn approaches.
Move out!
